data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Al Qahirah that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Qahirah, Egypt
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Al Qahirah, Egypt to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Al Qahirah access to a Bible in their own language.
Lord, please give the 344,037 believers in the state of Al Qahirah the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Bedouin, Levantine people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Bedouin, Levantine people know you.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Al Qahirah, Egypt. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord we pray you unite the 344,037 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Al Qahirah.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Qahirah, Egypt has a population of 7,734,600.

We estimate Al Qahirah has 344,037 people who might know Jesus, 671,492 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,719,070 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 344,037 believers in Al Qahirah to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests
